game.name: Mail Time
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 우편물을 전달하세요! 교육을 막 마친 새내기 우편 스카우트가 되어, 배낭을 메고, 편지를 챙겨 그럼블우드 그로브를 가로질러 배달하세요! 이 아늑한 전원생활 감성의 단순 플랫포머 게임에서 숲속의 동물들은 당신의 버섯 모자가 보이는 순간만을 간절히 기다리고 있어요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: It's Mail Time! As a newly trained Mail Scout, put on your pack, grab those letters, and deliver them across Grumblewood Grove! The forest animals eagerly await the sight of your mushroom hat in this cozy, cottagecore light-platformer adventure!

reviewHighlights.text: Unfortunately, I can't recommend this game. There are several bugs and areas needing improvement listed in the Steam discussions. And since it's been...
Its 2025 no game should be this cute and this BORING all at once
